Planar figure-eight:
(Chenciner and Montgomery, 2000)
intr = [0.970040	-0.24309;
-0.97004	0.24309;
0.00000	0.00000]
intv = [0.46620	0.43237;
0.46620	0.43237;
-0.93241	-0.86473]

Rotating figure-eight (3D):
intr = [1.08066966433283384729277098058181084e+00 -1.55416110399993636626738281562853938e-02 4.50000000000000008012254054667877767e-04; -5.39006847423408148822462134658328736e-01 3.46431693188283000967269808362258843e-01 2.10000000000000010402377743912172292e-04; -5.40558088505425865480001016566413696e-01 -3.45324810552283650813174768062774334e-01 -3.00000000000000007600257229123386082e-05]

Gridsearch:

ra	=0.540729000000
rb	=0.345282000000
va	=1.097094000000
vb	=0.233430000000
vz =0.099300000000
			

intr = [ra*2 0. 0.;
-ra rb 0.;
-ra -rb 0.]

intv =[0. vb*2 0.;
va -vb vz ;
 -va -vb -vz]


Case 5:
On the continuation of periodic orbits from the planar to the three-dimensional general three-body problem

m = [0.35 0.35 0.3]


rx1 = 0.500502
rx3 = -0.28200
vy3 = 1.176341
rz3 = 0.4
vx1 = 0
vx3 = 0
vz3 = 0
T = 1.4

theta = 1
rho = m[1]/m[2]
M1 = m[1]*(1+rho)
M2 = m[3]*(1-m[3])
R = ry3*rx1*(theta^2) + (rx3*vx1-rx1*vx3)*theta + vx1*vy3

#assume vz3 = 0
rz1 = -(M2/(M1*rx1*theta))*((vy3+theta*rx3)*rz3-ry3*vz3)
vz1 = -(M2/(M1*(rx1^2)*theta))*(R*rz3-(ry3*vx1-rx3*rx1*theta)*rz3)

intr = [rx1 0. rz1;
-(rx1*m[1]+rx3*m[3]) 0. -(rz1*m[1]+rz3*m[3]);
rx3 0. rz3]

intv = [0. 0. vz1;
0. 0. -vz1;
0. vy3 0.]


#BEST:


ra	=0.540329
rb	=0.344882
va	=1.097194
vb	=0.23333
vz =0.0989
			

intr = [ra*2 0. 0.;
-ra rb 0.;
-ra -rb 0.]

intv =[0. vb*2 0.;
va -vb vz ;
 -va -vb -vz]
